Row.Text: We believe the people of {1_City} would benefit from joining our nation. If we were to annex them, we should be able to bring them freedom.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Gold and Culture cost goes up each era[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per City State [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The City State of {1_City} will join our nation

We believe the people of {1_City} would benefit from joining our nation. If we were to annex them, we should be able to bring them freedom.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The City State of {1_City} will join our nation
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: To unlock this Decision, you must have met the City State[ENDCOLOR]
